document_title: Mediastinal tumor: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Dr. Nguyen Anh Dung said that mediastinal tumors cannot be prevented from forming, but they can be completely eliminated if detected and treated at an early stage. It is important that each person pay more attention to their health and have regular check-ups. In case of symptoms of chest pain, difficulty breathing, cough of unknown cause... lasting more than two weeks, you need to go to the hospital for examination. early.
Gathering a team of experienced experts in the field of cardiovascular and thoracic surgery, the Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital has successfully treated many cases of mediastinal tumors, in some cases The tumor is up to 10cm in size. The center prioritizes the development of modern, minimally invasive laparoscopic surgery techniques, helping to minimize the risk of complications for patients.
In addition, the Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital also examines and treats patients with other cardiovascular diseases such as coronary artery disease, heart failure, valvular heart disease, cardiomyopathy, and dilated cardiomyopathy. leg veins, congenital heart disease... The center is equipped with modern machinery systems such as 768-slice CT scanning system, DSA system - 2-plane coronary angiography, 4D ultrasound system... to help detect early disease and timely intervention.
If left untreated, mediastinal tumors can grow rapidly, seriously affecting the patient's health. Therefore, proactively check your health periodically for screening, early detection and effective treatment.
